verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou art worthy great Jehovah,
Thou art worthy mighty God,
Thou art worthy Abba Father,
Thou art worthy Lamb of God.
(JAPANESE)
Ho mu be ki shua Ehoba,
Ho mu be ki waga kami,
Ho mu be ki abba chichi,
Ho mu be ki ko hi tsu ji.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Digno eres grande Jehova,
Digno eres Dios de poder,
Digno eres Aba padre,
Digno eres, cordero de Dios.
